strength_details: Focused data engineering role with clear technical requirements
Established global consulting company (TCS) with stable employment
concern_details: Salary range appears below market rate for senior DE in Cupertino/SF Bay Area
Onsite requirement in Cupertino limits flexibility and geographic candidates
No career growth, learning opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned
Limited modern tech stack and engineering practices mentioned
No visa sponsorship mentioned - work authorization required
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers (5-8 years) seeking stable consulting work
Candidates already authorized to work in the US without visa sponsorship
Engineers living in or willing to relocate to Cupertino/SF Bay Area
probe_details: Clarify if salary range is negotiable and what benefits are included
Understand typical work hours, overtime expectations, and project deadlines
Ask about team structure, reporting, and collaboration model
Inquire about types of projects and client industries
Discuss potential for growth, skill development, and career advancement
leverage_details: Being local to Cupertino/SF Bay Area eliminates relocation concerns
Exact match for required skills (SQL, Python, Snowflake, data pipelines)
summary.overall_assessment: Standard consulting role at TCS with transparent compensation but below-market pay for the location. Well-defined data engineering responsibilities but limited growth opportunities and traditional corporate culture. Best suited for local candidates seeking stable consulting work rather than innovative tech environments.
